plot: Edo, an era of Warriors. There lived an immortal man, the slayer of hundreds, 'Manji'. He meets Rin, who swore vengeance for her parents. Rin's grudge is against a group of swordsmasters-itto-ryu. She asks Manji to be her bodyguard on her journey. He refuses, but then sees her late sister in Rin. So began the voilent struggle that would bring even Manji to his knees.
